org.modelio.api.module.commands

Class CommandScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.module.commands.CommandScope

  • public class CommandScope
extends Object
    This class encapsulates a scope definition for a command. A scope is composed of a metaclass and a stereotype. Both values are optional but at least one of these two fields must be provided.
    Author:
    phv
